CHAT.comment: April and her mother are in the living room of the apartment sitting on the couch by a coffee table. On the coffee table there are some books and toys

u.a: April is holding a Smurf in a car in her hand .
April gets off her seat and begins to leave .
April sits and looks at the camera .
mother returns with a plastic bucket containing the Smurfs , she puts it on the table .
April picks half a plastic shell out of the bucket and gives it to her mother .
April tips the Smurfs out on the table .
she is holding another Smurf which she puts on the table .
April picks up a Smurf and hands it to her mother .
April puts a Smurf at the far end of the table .
mother takes the Smurf and looks at it .
April points to the Smurf again
April puts the Smurf with the other ones she has set up on the table , April shakes her head .
April hands a Smurf to her mother
mother picks out a different Smurf
April picks up grandma's Smurf and knocks the one next to it over , she cries , then she sets the Smurf up again .
hands a Smurf to her mother
placing a Smurf at the end of the row
moves a pile of books out of the way
April reaches out across the table and makes stretching noises .
April hands a Smurf to her mother .
mother looks at the Smurf to identify it .
April picks up the last Smurf .
April reaches out with another Smurf , mother puts both Smurfs at the end of the line they have set up . April insists on exchanging the last Smurf for one that is on the table .
the line has reached the end of the table
mother puts it at the other end of the line
there are about twelve or so .
April tries to move a Smurf to the end of the line but there isn't room .
April's mother is the head resident in the graduate residence hall , she comes back
mother takes a pretend bite of a Smurf that April is holding out
April attempts to leave the table
April takes a drink and then gives her mother a kiss .
they move up the table towards the pile of books , April spits out something that she's eating .
mother accidentally catches April as she is moving the cloth she used to wipe her face with after April spat out whatever it was she was eating .
April points to the other page
April points to the letter o@l
April points to the letter m@l .
points to a ring of roses on the page
April lifts the blanket she was sitting on and dumps it on the book .
April points to the picture her mother asked about .
April gives the blanket to her mother , mother puts it on the chair
mother leaves to get slippers , April sits and looks at camera .
mother puts the book they were reading on the couch behind them
mother gets two other books off the couch
April hands her blanket to her mother .
April goes to get the bag but as she stands up she becomes entangles in the blanket she was sitting on , she disentangles herself and then holds the blanket out to her mother .
April starts looking in the bag
April looks up towards her mother
April still digging in the bag
April gets two more books and hands one of them to her mother too
April notices that the book is split on the spine
April reaches out and takes the puppy book back from her mother
April pushes another one to her mother
touches the third book which is in April's hand
April opens the book and points to the colors
she is pointing to what seems to be an uncolored circle , mother looks
April points at the next circle
April points to a different colored circle
April points to a different color
April points to the same color
April holds her finger out to her mother
mother puts her hand on April's arm
she goes back to the book and turns the page
April turns the page and points again
silence during which April looks at the book , she points to a picture and looks at her mother , they exchange smiles .
April points at something else and looks at her mother
April whispers inaudibly again , mother nods and laughs
April gets off her seat , walks around the table and gives Roy the book
April goes back to the bag and gets a toy out of it and goes back to her mother . it is a music box shapes like a radio .
the blanket that she was sitting on has fallen off her chair .
mother starts to cover the seat
mother puts the blanket over the seat
April sits at the table again
April winds up the toy , it is a musical box
April holds the music box up to her mother's ear
pictures move across the front of the music box as it plays , April tries to stop them .
April points to one of the pictures on the music box
April turns the knob on the music bo
April wants it to turn backwards
points to where the pictures reappear
no response , mother taps the back of the radio .
April turns back to the front of the radio
April gyrates and wiggles on her chair
April stops and tries to stop the music box
they both sit in silence and watch the pictures in the music box
mother stands up and sits on the couch , April goes to the window , climbs on a chair and looks out .
she gets off the chair and goes to her mother .
April begins to shake her head
mother repeats the sounds to herself quietly but still doesn't understand , April continues to mumble and groan .
April looks at her mother and then goes to the table and starts to count the Smurfs that are lined up on it .
April picks up a Smurf that is talking on the phone and puts it to her ear
April puts the Smurf to her mother's ear
April moves it to mother's other ear
she removes it from her mother's ear
April trying to put the blanket on her seat
mother sits on the floor by the seat again
Josina is someone known to April , her mother and Roy
mother gets called to the door
silence , April holds the music box out to Tom
April turns to look at her mother who is removing the lampshade .
silence during which April drinks her juice , mother stares at her fixedly
mother stares at her again and moves up so close that their noses touch .
April looks at her mother's eyes
April points to the other eye
April puts her finger on her eye lid
April has hold of her mother's hair
April points to her own eyes
April looks back at her mother's eyes and points to them
April picks up her toy radio
silence during which April drinks again
mother tries to remove it from the table but April resists
they look around , April sees the big book on the couch behind them
April starts clearing the table top
mother hands April a small plastic bucket
she moves them across the table
April reaches out and moves all the Smurfs
April slips off her seat because her mother's hand is in the way
points to the book and her mother gets it
mother moves her hand and April sits
pointing to the cover of the book
mother points to something in the picture
silence during which April opens the book and they look at the picture .
April pushes her nose up with her finger
April takes her mother's hand and puts her mother's finger against her own nose
mother pushes April's nose up again
April takes her mother's finger and puts it in her nose
April starts to pick her nose
mother collapses laughing , April laughs too
April closes the book and points to the back cover of it .
mother tries to correct April's mispronunciation
April tries to copy her mother's pronunciation
she is pointing to the same thing her mother was pointing to
April is turning back through the book and pointing to something on the pages .
April points to the next page
April tries to split a thicker page
silence during which they look at the book again
April picks up her cup and offers it to her mother
silence during which April drinks and then offers the cup to her mother again
April starts to take off her dress
points to the shadow on the ceiling
April proceeds to take off her dress and starts on her underwear
silence during which April takes off her pants
April struggles with her pants until she gets them off , mother helps April to put on her nightie
silence during which April walks to the chair
indicates the chair next to the one with the microphone on it
April climbs on to the chair seat
April points to the next chair
April is now sitting on the chair that Roy was sitting on
April stands on the chair seat and looks out of the window
no one in the room is called Peter .
April sits on the chair again
Roy moves back to the chair
the music box plays and April hands it to Roy .
April takes the box back from Roy and puts it to his ear
<bef> April walks back towards her mother and points at the microphone
<aft> April leaves the room . <bef> April hands the music box to her mother who lifts it to her ear
April waves , walks over to Roy
